info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 2:50PM CDT until August 03 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN...NORTHEASTERN SANGAMON AND NORTHWESTERN MACON COUNTIES... At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Warrensburg, or 9 miles northwest of Decatur, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harristown, Warrensburg and Decatur. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 134 and 138. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
